description: From French quadrumane, from Late Latin quadrumanus.

adjectives.description: quadrumane (comparative more quadrumane, superlative most quadrumane)

entries.meaning: (zoology, now rare) Pertaining to such an animal; quadrumanous; loosely, "ape-like".
(zoology, now rare) An animal having four hands and feet with opposable digits, specifically a member of the now obsolete order of mammals Quadrumana, comprising all non-human primates; a primate.
